recommendations: Apurva Chamaria “Tarun and his exec hiring firm i.e. TalentGen stand out for their exceptional network and deep industry knowledge. Tarun has an innate ability to match organizations with the right talent, leveraging a robust network to present the best candidates. He has been instrumental in helping my portfolio co's identify and onboard many executive leaders who have already made a significant impact on their businesses. If you're looking for someone who knows how to find the perfect fit for your organization, look no further than Tarun.”
Vinay Singh “Talentgen has been helping multiple Fireside portfolio companies put together their early teams.”
